message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $13,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, even at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the value of this product is truly significant. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?

I understand your point about the product's value, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. How about we try $10,200? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me too.
